scripts.dev: concurrently "npm --workspace apps/backend run dev" "npm --workspace apps/frontend run dev"
scripts.desktop:dev: concurrently "cross-env OPENPRISM_DESKTOP=1 OPENPRISM_TUNNEL=false PORT=8787 npm --workspace apps/backend run dev" "npm --workspace apps/frontend run dev" "npm --workspace apps/desktop run dev"
scripts.desktop:build: npm --workspace apps/frontend run build && npm --workspace apps/desktop run build
scripts.desktop:dist: npm --workspace apps/frontend run build && npm --workspace apps/desktop run dist
scripts.tunnel: npm run build && cross-env OPENPRISM_TUNNEL=localtunnel node apps/backend/src/index.js
scripts.tunnel:cf: npm run build && cross-env OPENPRISM_TUNNEL=cloudflared node apps/backend/src/index.js
scripts.tunnel:ngrok: npm run build && cross-env OPENPRISM_TUNNEL=ngrok node apps/backend/src/index.js
